flavor: "'What does it do?' Whatever I bloody want it to do." -Director Haas
stripped_text: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.
text: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.
title: Bifrost Array

flavor: Sagittarius promised foresight, but brought only regret.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, trash 1 program. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 program.
text: [subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 1 program. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 program.
title: Sagittarius

flavor: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
title: Hostile Infrastructure

flavor: Gemini promised pleasure, but dealt only pain.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, do 1 net damage. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, do 1 net damage.
text: [subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, do 1 net damage. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, do 1 net damage.
title: Gemini

flavor: "We've received seventeen crates from ChiLo. We'll hit stores the same day we sign the license agreement."
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may reveal 1 asset or upgrade in HQ or Archives. Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.
text: When you score this agenda, you may reveal 1 asset or upgrade in HQ or Archives. Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.
title: License Acquisition

flavor: "A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"
stripped_text: Interrupt > The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
text: [interrupt] > The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
title: Daily Business Show

flavor: "Our new barriers will be built on the rubble of our enemies".
stripped_text: All barrier ice have +1 strength. When you score Superior Cyberwalls, gain 1 credit for each rezzed barrier.
text: All barrier ice have +1 strength. When you score Superior Cyberwalls, gain 1[credit] for each rezzed barrier.
title: Superior Cyberwalls

flavor: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1 credit. 1 credit,trash: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text:
When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[credit].
1[credit],[trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
title: Executive Boot Camp

flavor: "It's weird. I hit the server again and it was like a totally different piece of ice was waiting for me. Lost my root daemon. I shouldn't have nested them seven deep."
stripped_text: Lycan can be advanced. While Lycan has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains code gate and loses sentry. Subroutine Trash 1 program.
text: Lycan can be advanced. While Lycan has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains code gate and loses sentry. [subroutine] Trash 1 program.
title: Lycan

flavor: The last thing he saw was the tattoo of a strange beast on his captor's neck. It had a goat's head, the body of a lion, and the tail of a serpent. Then the bag was yanked over his head, and there was only darkness.
stripped_text: Trace 3 If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.
text: Trace 3 If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.
title: Snatch and Grab

flavor: He who holds the staff of wisdom.
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
text: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
title: Merlin

stripped_text: You cannot use Shell Corporation more than once per turn. click: Place 3 credits on Shell Corporation. click: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.
text:
You cannot use Shell Corporation more than once per turn.
[click]: Place 3[credit] on Shell Corporation.
[click]: Take all credits from Shell Corporation.
title: Shell Corporation

flavor: "Sometimes you just need a brain in a jar." -g00ru
stripped_text: Your memory limit is equal to the number of cards in your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
text: Your memory limit is equal to the number of cards in your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Ekomind

flavor: "He only likes to eat live meat." -MaxX
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Cerberus "Cuj.0" H3

flavor: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
title: Leela Patel: Trained Pragmatist

flavor: "Useful for fetching all sorts of things…but you better have a treat ready if he likes it." -Iain Stirling
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Cerberus "Rex" H2

flavor: "They'll deliver anything to anywhere. Make sure to request air holes if you're shipping someone important, though."
stripped_text: Place 1 credit on Zona Sul Shipping when your turn begins. click: Take all credits from Zona Sul Shipping. Trash Zona Sul Shipping if you are tagged.
text:
Place 1[credit] on Zona Sul Shipping when your turn begins.
[click]: Take all credits from Zona Sul Shipping.
Trash Zona Sul Shipping if you are tagged.
title: Zona Sul Shipping

flavor: Cybsoft started by designing games. Eventually they just redesigned the same game each year, and to combat piracy created a dedicated machine to play it. Profits grew ten-fold.
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to install programs.
text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to install programs.
title: Cybsoft MacroDrive

flavor: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Cerberus "Lady" H1

stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of breaching HQ, you may install this program from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.
text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of breaching HQ, you may install this program from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.
title: Utopia Shard
